parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of Bluemix. When running on Bluemix, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password used to authenticate with the service. Username and password credentials are only required to run your application locally or outside of Bluemix. When running on Bluemix, the credentials will be automatically loaded from the `VCAP_SERVICES` environment variable.

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: The request headers

parameters.name: headers[X-Watson-Learning-Opt-Out]
parameters.description: opt-out of data collection

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: override default service base url

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the workspace.

parameters.name: dialog_node
parameters.description: The dialog node ID. This string must conform to the following restrictions:  - It can contain only Unicode alphanumeric, space, underscore, hyphen, and dot characters.  - It must be no longer than 1024 characters.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the dialog node. This string cannot contain carriage return, newline, or tab characters, and it must be no longer than 128 characters.

parameters.name: conditions
parameters.description: The condition that will trigger the dialog node. This string cannot contain carriage return, newline, or tab characters, and it must be no longer than 2048 characters.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: The ID of the parent dialog node.

parameters.name: previous_sibling
parameters.description: The ID of the previous dialog node.

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: The output of the dialog node. For more information about how to specify dialog node output, see the [documentation](https://console.bluemix.net/docs/services/conversation/dialog-overview.html#complex).

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context for the dialog node.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: The metadata for the dialog node.

parameters.name: next_step
parameters.description: The next step to be executed in dialog processing.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: An array of objects describing any actions to be invoked by the dialog node.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The alias used to identify the dialog node. This string must conform to the following restrictions:  - It can contain only Unicode alphanumeric, space, underscore, hyphen, and dot characters.  - It must be no longer than 64 characters.

parameters.name: node_type
parameters.description: How the dialog node is processed.

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: How an `event_handler` node is processed.

parameters.name: variable
parameters.description: The location in the dialog context where output is stored.

parameters.name: digress_in
parameters.description: Whether this top-level dialog node can be digressed into.

parameters.name: digress_out
parameters.description: Whether this dialog node can be returned to after a digression.

parameters.name: digress_out_slots
parameters.description: Whether the user can digress to top-level nodes while filling out slots.
